description: A Full Stack Developer works on both frontend and backend of web applications, handling databases, servers, systems engineering, and clients. They build complete web applications from scratch and maintain existing systems.

learning_path.title: Web Fundamentals
learning_path.description: Master HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript basics. Learn DOM manipulation, events, and ES6+ features. Build static websites and understand responsive design principles.

learning_path.title: Frontend Framework - React
learning_path.description: Learn React fundamentals including components, props, state, hooks, and lifecycle methods. Understand JSX, virtual DOM, and component composition patterns.

learning_path.title: Backend Development - Node.js
learning_path.description: Master Node.js runtime, Express.js framework, middleware, routing, and asynchronous programming. Learn to build RESTful APIs and handle HTTP requests.

learning_path.title: Database Management
learning_path.description: Learn SQL with PostgreSQL and NoSQL with MongoDB. Understand database design, normalization, indexing, queries, and data modeling for web applications.

learning_path.title: Authentication & Security
learning_path.description: Implement JWT authentication, OAuth, password hashing, CORS, XSS protection, and CSRF tokens. Learn security best practices and common vulnerabilities.

learning_path.title: DevOps & Deployment
learning_path.description: Learn Git workflows, CI/CD pipelines, Docker containerization, and cloud deployment on AWS or Azure. Understand environment management and server configuration.

learning_path.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
learning_path.description: Write unit tests with Jest, integration tests, and end-to-end tests with Cypress. Learn TDD principles and debugging techniques.

learning_path.title: Advanced Topics & Optimization
learning_path.description: Learn performance optimization, caching strategies with Redis, WebSockets for real-time features, GraphQL, microservices architecture, and scalability patterns.

recommended_projects: Social Media Dashboard with real-time updates
Task Management System with team collaboration
Blog Platform with CMS and SEO optimization

description: Data Scientists analyze complex data to extract insights, build predictive models, and solve business problems using statistical analysis, machine learning, and data visualization techniques.

learning_path.title: Python Programming Foundation
learning_path.description: Master Python syntax, data structures, OOP concepts, and file handling. Learn to write clean, efficient code and understand Python libraries ecosystem.

learning_path.title: Mathematics for Data Science
learning_path.description: Study linear algebra, calculus, statistics, probability distributions, hypothesis testing, and statistical inference essential for machine learning.

learning_path.title: Data Analysis with Pandas
learning_path.description: Learn data manipulation, cleaning, transformation, aggregation, and exploratory data analysis using Pandas. Master handling missing data and outliers.

learning_path.title: Data Visualization
learning_path.description: Create insightful visualizations using Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly. Learn to communicate findings effectively through charts, graphs, and dashboards.

learning_path.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
learning_path.description: Study supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms: regression, classification, clustering, dimensionality reduction. Understand model evaluation and validation.

learning_path.title: Advanced ML & Feature Engineering
learning_path.description: Learn ensemble methods, hyperparameter tuning, cross-validation, feature selection, and engineering techniques to improve model performance.

learning_path.title: Deep Learning & Neural Networks
learning_path.description: Master neural networks, CNNs for computer vision, RNNs/LSTMs for sequences, transfer learning, and model optimization using TensorFlow or PyTorch.

learning_path.title: SQL & Database Management
learning_path.description: Learn SQL queries, joins, subqueries, window functions, and database optimization for efficient data extraction and manipulation.

learning_path.title: Big Data & Model Deployment
learning_path.description: Introduction to Spark for big data processing. Learn to deploy models using Flask, FastAPI, Docker, and cloud services like AWS or Azure.

learning_path.title: Real-world Projects & Portfolio
learning_path.description: Build end-to-end projects from data collection to model deployment. Create a strong portfolio showcasing problem-solving and technical skills.

recommended_projects: Sentiment Analysis of Social Media Data
Stock Price Prediction using Time Series

description: DevOps Engineers bridge development and operations teams, automating and streamlining software development lifecycle. They implement CI/CD pipelines, manage infrastructure, and ensure system reliability and scalability.

learning_path.title: Linux Fundamentals & Command Line
learning_path.description: Master Linux OS, shell commands, file system, permissions, process management, and system administration tasks. Learn shell scripting for automation.

learning_path.title: Networking & Security Basics
learning_path.description: Understand TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, load balancing, firewalls, SSL/TLS certificates, and network troubleshooting.

learning_path.title: Version Control & Git
learning_path.description: Learn Git workflows, branching strategies, merge conflicts resolution, Git hooks, and collaborative development practices.

learning_path.title: Containerization with Docker
learning_path.description: Master Docker containers, images, Dockerfile creation, Docker Compose, networking, volumes, and container registry management.

learning_path.title: Container Orchestration - Kubernetes
learning_path.description: Learn K8s architecture, pods, services, deployments, ingress, persistent volumes, ConfigMaps, secrets, and cluster management.

learning_path.title: CI/CD Pipeline Implementation
learning_path.description: Build automated pipelines using Jenkins, GitLab CI, or GitHub Actions. Implement testing, building, and deployment automation.

learning_path.title: Infrastructure as Code - Terraform
learning_path.description: Learn to provision and manage infrastructure using Terraform. Understand state management, modules, and best practices.

learning_path.title: Configuration Management - Ansible
learning_path.description: Automate configuration management using Ansible playbooks, roles, and inventory management for consistent environments.

learning_path.title: Cloud Platforms - AWS/Azure
learning_path.description: Master cloud services including EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, VPC, IAM, CloudWatch. Learn cloud architecture and best practices.

learning_path.title: Monitoring & Logging
learning_path.description: Implement monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana. Set up centralized logging with ELK stack. Create alerts and dashboards.

recommended_projects: Infrastructure as Code for Multi-cloud Deployment
